Articles.Content:
Moved over to the Lounge, where we keep such things.

Standard reminder: Do what you like elsewhere, but do not carry on roleplay on the forums.

You're still using our map without permission or credit and your argument of "well do you have a copyright" doesn't work anymore because we do have one

Did you give credit to @Pds314 when you used his?

As I've told a moderator before, the mods here can't do anything about it but they should be aware of this in the case of it spilling over here.

Edited February 22, 2016 by Spartwo
Roleplay is banned because of the trouble it causes, and as even a simple announcement of roleplay also causes trouble this thread is now locked.
